audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization of software development processes. 10% productivity gain is a measurable efficiency improvement in an existing business function. Pattern is highly replicable across software development organizations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (allpay), specific quantified metric (10%), appears to be from official case study or interview. Credible and traceable.
